RECREATION ACTIVITY COORDINATOR

SUMMARY

To secure a position related to the personal care of clients hair, skin, and nails, and continue my education at the post secondary level towards additional certifications and /or an advance degree.
Highlights
Licensed Cosmetologist Strong communication skills Make-up application Bridal makeup specialist Self-motivated Sales background Outstanding client care Superior attention to detail
Hair coloring temporary semi permanent and permanent
